name: Neptune's Garden
description:
BUILD AND MAINTAIN THE MOST ABUNDENT CORAL REEF SPA!
Begin with an empty reef, as time goes on; hire cleaners, grow coral & create the best day spa in all the 7 seas!

HIRE WORKER CREATURES!
Lots of fun & hard working creatures can clean your stinky customers as super quick speeds!

BUILD FARMS!
Feed your customers and keep them happy with different farms and foods!

UPGRADE DECORATIONS!
Decorate your reef with cute lights to attract more customers & keep your workers happy!

GROW HEALTHY CORALS!
Upgrade your corals to keep the garden reef pretty & colourful!

CARE FOR YOUR FISHY CUSTOMERS!
Dirty customers need your help to get clean!
